00057 class DHTransform {
00058 
00060   vec3 dtrans;
00061 
00063   vec3 atrans;
00064 
00066   transf tr4TimesTr3;
00067 
00069   transf tr2;
00070 
00072   transf tr1;
00073 
00075   transf tran;
00076 
00078   double theta;
00079 
00081   double d;
00082 
00084   double a;
00085 
00087   double alpha;
00088 
00089 public:
00090   DHTransform(double thval=0.0,double dval=0.0,double aval=0.0,
00091               double alval=0.0);
00092   DHTransform( const DHTransform *d ){
00093           memcpy( this, d, sizeof(DHTransform));
00094   }
00095 
00097   double getD() const {return d;}
00098 
00100   double getTheta() const {return theta;}
00101 
00103   const transf& getTran() const {return tran;}
00104   
00110   transf getTran(double thetaVal,double dVal) const
00111     {
00112       return tr4TimesTr3 * translate_transf(vec3(0,0,dVal)) * 
00113         rotate_transf(thetaVal,vec3(0,0,1));
00114     }
00115 
00116   void setD(double q);
00117   void setTheta(double q);
00118 };

00131 class Joint {
00132 protected:
00134   int DOFnum;
00135 
00137   KinematicChain *owner;
00138 
00140   int jointNum;
00141 
00143   bool draggerAttached;
00144 
00146   double dynamicsVal;
00147 
00149   double velocity;
00150 
00152   double minVal,maxVal;
00153 
00155   double mCouplingRatio;  
00156 
00158   double c;  
00159 
00161   double f1;
00162 
00164   double f0;
00165 
00167   double mK;
00168 
00170   double mRestVal;
00171 
00173   vec3 worldAxis;
00174 
00176   DHTransform *DH;
00177 
00179   SoTransform *IVTran;
00180 
00181 public:
00183   DynJoint *dynJoint;
00184 
00187  Joint(KinematicChain *k) : DOFnum(0), owner(k), jointNum(-1), draggerAttached(false), dynamicsVal(0.0),
00188     velocity(0.0),minVal(0.0),maxVal(0.0),mCouplingRatio(1.0),c(0.0),f1(0.0),f0(0.0),mK(0.0),
00189         mRestVal(0.0), DH(NULL),
00190     IVTran(NULL), dynJoint(NULL) {IVTran = new SoTransform(); IVTran->ref();}
00191 
00192   virtual ~Joint();
00193 
00198   virtual int initJoint(const char *info, int jnum) =0;
00199 
00201   void cloneFrom(const Joint *original);
00202 
00204   virtual int setVal(double q)=0;
00205 
00207   virtual void applyInternalWrench(double magnitude)=0;
00208 
00210   virtual void applyPassiveInternalWrenches();
00211  
00213   void setVelocity(double v) {velocity = v;}
00214 
00216   void setDynamicsVal(double v) {dynamicsVal = v;}
00217 
00220   void setWorldAxis(const vec3 &wa) {worldAxis = normalise(wa);}
00221 
00223   void setDraggerAttached(bool b) {draggerAttached = b;}
00224 
00225   //Accessors:
00226 
00228   void worldJacobian(transf toTarget, Matrix *J);
00229 
00231   void localJacobian(transf toTarget, Matrix *J);
00232 
00234   int getNum() const {return jointNum;}
00235 
00237   virtual double getVal() const =0;
00238 
00240   virtual JointT getType() const =0;
00241 
00244   virtual transf getTran(double jointVal) const =0;
00245 
00248   virtual transf getDynamicsTran() const =0;
00249 
00251   int getDOFNum() const {return DOFnum;}
00252 
00254   double getCouplingRatio() const {return mCouplingRatio;}
00255 
00257   double getSpringStiffness() {return mK;}
00258 
00260   double getOffset() const {return c;}
00261 
00263   double getMin() const {return minVal;}
00264 
00266   double getMax() const {return maxVal;}
00267 
00269   double getVelocity() const {return velocity;}
00270 
00274   double getFriction() const {
00275     return -f1 * velocity + (velocity<0 ? f0 : (velocity>0 ? -f0 : 0.0));
00276   }
00277 
00280   double getSpringForce() const;
00281 
00284   double getDynamicsVal() const {return dynamicsVal;}
00285 
00287   transf const& getTran() const {return DH->getTran();}
00288 
00290   vec3 const& getWorldAxis() const {return worldAxis;}
00291

00294 
00297   SoTransform *getIVTran() const {return IVTran;}
00298 
00300   void setParameters(double couple, double k){mCouplingRatio = couple; mK =k;}
00301 };

00308 class PrismaticJoint : public Joint {
00309 
00310 public:
00311 
00313   PrismaticJoint(KinematicChain *k) : Joint(k) {}
00314 
00315   virtual int initJoint(const char *info, int jnum);
00316 
00317   virtual void applyInternalWrench(double magnitude);
00318 
00319   virtual int setVal(double q);
00320 
00322   virtual double getVal() const {return DH->getD() - c;}
00323 
00325   virtual JointT getType() const {return PRISMATIC;}
00326 
00327   transf getTran(double jointVal) const {
00328     return DH->getTran(DH->getTheta(),jointVal + c);
00329   }
00330 
00331   transf getDynamicsTran() const {
00332     return DH->getTran(DH->getTheta(),dynamicsVal);
00333   }
00334 
00335 };

00341 class RevoluteJoint : public Joint {
00342 
00343 public:
00344 
00346   RevoluteJoint(KinematicChain *k) : Joint(k) {}
00347 
00348   virtual int initJoint(const char *info, int jnum);
00349 
00351   virtual double getVal() const {return DH->getTheta() - c;}
00352 
00353   virtual void applyInternalWrench(double magnitude);
00354 
00355   virtual int setVal(double q);
00356 
00358   virtual JointT getType() const {return REVOLUTE;}
00359 
00360 
00361   transf getTran(double jointVal) const {
00362     return DH->getTran(jointVal + c,DH->getD());
00363   }
00364   transf getDynamicsTran() const {
00365     return DH->getTran(dynamicsVal,DH->getD());
00366   }
00367 
00368 };
